## 8.2
```{r}
library(mosaicData)

ggplot(data=CPS85,aes(x=age,y=wage))+xlim(0,60)+ylim(0,30)+geom_point(aes(shape=married))+facet_wrap(~sector,ncol=3)

ggplot(data=CPS85,aes(x=age,y=wage))+geom_point()+facet_grid(married~ .)+facet_grid(sex~.)
```

##9.3
#1
```{r}
diamonds %>%
  group_by(color) %>%
  summarise(averagecarat=mean(carat)) %>%
  arrange(desc(averagecarat)) %>%
  head(1)
```

#2
```{r}
diamonds %>%
  group_by(clarity) %>%
  summarise(averagetable = mean(table/carat)) %>%
  arrange(desc(averagetable)) %>%
  head(1)
```
